projects.title: PENSIONIFY
projects.description: System of memberships' inscriptions into pension funds
projects.detail: Using a BPM (Business Process Management) approach, this system is capable of orienting the flow of inscription in a pension fund since the initial demand of membership by the client until the bonus reception by their members.

projects.title: PARCEIRO
projects.description: System used by the MPDFT partner institutions, developped using PHP/Laravel(back-end) and AngularJS(front-end)
projects.detail: Responsible for create a uniform way to control the accomplishment of work done by the convicted, the MPDFT partner institutions can show transparency to the MPDFT and the society, showing to both who they are controling and if the convicted ones are doing their job.

experience.title: FULLSTACK DEVELOPER - SOFTWARE ARCHITECT
experience.description: A big challenge presented itself in my career. New job, new country, new language, new technologies. An excellent learning experience in many aspects, both professional and personal. With a lot of adaptability and hard work, the quality of the service performed is now at a new level!

experience.title: FULLSTACK DEVELOPER - SOFTWARE ARCHITECT
experience.description: A big challenge presented itself in my career. New job, new country, new language, new technologies. An excellent learning experience in many aspects, both professional and personal. With a lot of adaptability and hard work, the quality of the service performed is now at a new level!

experience.title: FREELANCE WEB DEVELOPMENT
experience.description: After the conclusion of a specialization as a Full Stack Developer, at the University of Hong Kong/Coursera, I have done some freelance work, using mainly the MEAN Stack (MongoDB, Express, AngularJS, NodeJS), always trying to use the most recent technologies for both Front-end and Back-end. Besides that, I am always studying the best practices of programming, like Mobile First design and Agile Development Techniques.

experience.title: CHIEF OF DATA CONSOLIDATION
experience.description: In the Department of Alternative Ways of Emprisonment, strategic inside MPDFT and responsible for monitoring authors of minor crimes, was responsible for develop a system capable to register and control the compliance of tasks by convicted ones, like payments to NGOs or mandatory services done for those institutions. After implantation and continuous system evolution, the control done by the department was not only improved, but the values paid to the institutions has been increasing in an order of 12% yearly, helping those NGOs to better aid the society.

experience.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
mainTech: Delphi, ASP, Java, Struts, MS SQL Server
experience.description: Still at MPDFT, recently admitted by the systems development team, a broad universe of systems and programming languages was learnt, going from Delphi, until Java, passing through website development using ASP. Responsible tom maintain until 30 systems simultaneously.

experience.title: IT SUPPORT TECHNICIAN
experience.description: Ranked 4th out 1200 candidates to the position of Informatics Technician at MPU, government institution, I was very excited! Tech Support was my name! It doesn't matter the device! CPU formatting, HD images creation, antivirus installation, printers fixing, backup Creation and restoring... There was no bad time! Everything could be solved at IT world!
